member.summary: Updates the avatar's bones.

member.summary: Scales the model to match the scale of the body detected.

member.summary: Scales the model to match the scale of the body detected.

member.summary: Specifies whether the avatar will move in the 3D world space.

member.summary: Specifies whether the avatar will move in the 3D world space.

member.summary: Jump calculations.

member.summary: The motion smoothing factor (0.0 - 1.0).

member.summary: The motion smoothing factor (0.0 - 1.0).

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.Flip
member.summary: Flips the avatar movements horizontally.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.Initialize(UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Assigns a new root GameObject for the avatar. Caches animator bones for rotation.
member.param: The new root GameObject from the avatar to use.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.Initialize
member.summary: Caches animator bones for rotation.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.DoTPose
member.summary: Forces model to T-Pose.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.CalculateOrientations(LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Body)
member.summary: Calculations are done by finding a normal, a destination and the offset to the original rotation. The normal defines the UP vector in order to rotate the joints based on an axis. The destination is where the joint should "look at". The hard coded offset of each joint rotates the joint to the correct place from its original rotation from the T-Pose.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.CalculateScale(LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Body)
member.summary: Calculates and applies the scale to the avatar to meet the body.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.GetBone(UnityEngine.HumanBodyBones)
member.summary: Finds and returns the bone of the Animator.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.GetDirection(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Calculates and returns the direction of a joint on a body.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.GetNormal(LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D,LightBuzz.Vector3D)
member.summary: Calculates and returns the normal of three joints on a body.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.UpdateJointRotation(LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.JointType,UnityEngine.Quaternion)
member.summary: Updates the rotation of the bone.
member.param: Joint type to update rotation for.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.Update(LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Body,LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Floor)
member.summary: Initializes the avatar if it has not been initialized. Updates joints orientation and position.
member.param: The body data to feed the avatar with.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.UpdateJump(LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Body,LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Floor)
member.summary: Calculates jump and crouch.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.PositionBonesAtPoint(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Sets the position of the highest hierarchy bone at the position, thus moving the whole avatar.
member.param: The new position of the root bone.
member.returns: True if the bone was positioned. False if it failed.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Avateering.Avatar.PositionAt(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Sets the position of the avatar at point.
member.param: The new position of the avatar.

member.summary: Applies scale to the Avatar Root.

member.summary: Applies scale to the highest hierarchy bone.

member.summary: Center of mass will be used to calculate offset.

member.summary: Counts how many parents a transform has.

member.summary: Represents and Inertial Measurement Unit (e.g. Accelerometer/Gyroscope).

member.summary: The timestamp of the unit.

member.summary: The sample of the IMU (in meters per second squared).

member.summary: Creates an empty IMU.

member.summary: Clones an IMU.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.IMU.Tilt(LightBuzz.Axis,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the tilt of the camera. Positive: the camera faces upwards. Negative: the camera faces downwards. Zero: the camera is straight.
member.param: The axis to get the tilt from.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.IMU.Pitch(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the rotation of the camera around the X axis. Positive: the camera faces downwards. Negative: the camera faces upwards. Zero: the camera is straight.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.IMU.Yaw(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the rotation of the camera around the Y axis. Positive: the camera faces downwards. Negative: the camera faces upwards. Zero: the camera is straight.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.IMU.Roll(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the rotation of the camera around the Z axis. Positive: the camera faces downwards. Negative: the camera faces upwards. Zero: the camera is straight.

member.summary: The vertical distance between the floor and the sensor (absolute value).

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Floor.Tilt
member.summary: Returns the tilt of the camera. Positive: the camera faces upwards. Negative: the camera faces downwards. Zero: the camera is straight. NaN: the accelerometer did not provide valid data or the field of view is very limited.

member.summary: Returns whether the field of view is OK or limited.

member.summary: Calculates the distance between the floor plane and the specified point in the 3D space.
member.param: A point in the 3D world space.
member.returns: The distance between the floor plane and the point (in meters).

member.summary: Maps the specified point from the 2D depth space to the 3D world space.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode
member.summary: Depth sensor capture modes.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode.Off
member.summary: Depth sensor will be turned off with this setting.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode.NFOV_2X2Binned
member.summary: Depth captured at 320x288. Passive IR is also captured at 320x288.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode.NFOV_Unbinned
member.summary: Depth captured at 640x576. Passive IR is also captured at 640x576.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode.WFOV_2X2Binned
member.summary: Depth captured at 512x512. Passive IR is also captured at 512x512.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode.WFOV_Unbinned
member.summary: Depth captured at 1024x1024. Passive IR is also captured at 1024x1024.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.DepthMode.PassiveIR
member.summary: Passive IR only, captured at 1024x1024.

member.summary: Encapsulates the configuration parameters of a Kinect sensor device.

member.summary: The default device index number.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultFramePerSecond
member.summary: The default frame rate.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultDepthMode
member.summary: The default depth mode format.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultColorFormat
member.summary: The default color image format.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultColorResolution
member.summary: The default color image resolution.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultSyncedImagesOnly
member.summary: The default synchronization mode of Color and Depth images.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultWiredSyncMode
member.summary: The default wired sync mode.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultEnableColorPointCloud
member.summary: The default enable color-based point cloud option.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultEnableDepthPointCloud
member.summary: The default enable depth-based point cloud option.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultEnableFloorTracking
member.summary: The default enable floor tracking option.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultEnableIMU
member.summary: The default value for enabling the IMU unit.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultSmoothing
member.summary: The default body-tracking smoothing.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultProcessingMode
member.summary: The default body-tracking processing mode (CPU/GPU).

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DefaultSensorOrientation
member.summary: The default sensor orientation.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DeviceIndex
member.summary: The index of the current device.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.FPS
member.summary: The frame rate.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.DepthMode
member.summary: The depth mode.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.ColorFormat
member.summary: The color image format.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.ColorResolution
member.summary: The color image resolution.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.SyncedImagesOnly
member.summary: Specifies whether the device will only serve synchronized Color and Depth images.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.WiredSyncMode
member.summary: Specifies the wired sync mode of the device.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.EnableIMU
member.summary: Specifies whether the sensor should enable the IMU. ATTENTION: As reported to Microsoft, the IMU is causing a memory leak. Use with caution! https://github.com/microsoft/Azure-Kinect-Sensor-SDK/issues/1230

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.EnableColorPointCloud
member.summary: Specifies whether the sensor should generate a color point cloud.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.EnableDepthPointCloud
member.summary: Specifies whether the sensor should generate a depth point cloud.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.EnableFloorTracking
member.summary: Specifies whether the sensor should generate a depth point cloud.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.Smoothing
member.summary: Specifies the temporal smoothing across frames (0.0 - 1.0). Set to 0.0 for no smoothing. Set to 1.0 for full smoothing. Less smoothing will increase the responsiveness of the detected skeletons but will cause more positional and orientational jitters.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.ProcessingMode
member.summary: Specifies the body-tracking processing mode (CPU/GPU). GPU provides significantly better tracking.

member.name: P:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.SensorOrientation
member.summary: Specifies the sensor orientation for body-tracking. This will not rotate the color/depth view; it will simply optimize body-tracking for the desired sensor rotation.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Specifies whether two configurations are the same.
member.returns: True if both configurations are the same. False otherwise.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as the hash function for the type.
member.returns: A hash representation of the current object.

member.name: M:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.Configuration.ToString
member.summary: Lists the configuration parameters of the current .
member.returns: A string representation of the current configuration.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Azure Kinect Unity SDK by LightBuzz.

member.name: T:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.TrackingState
member.summary: The tracking state.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.TrackingState.None
member.summary: The joint is out of range (too far from depth camera).

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.TrackingState.Low
member.summary: The joint is not observed (likely due to occlusion), predicted joint pose.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.TrackingState.Medium
member.summary: Medium confidence in joint pose. Current SDK will only provide joints up to this confidence level.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.TrackingState.High
member.summary: High confidence in joint pose. Placeholder for future SDK.

member.name: F:LightBuzz.Kinect4Azure.TrackingState.Count
member.summary: The total number of tracking states.
